entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
